item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 18, 2025 at 3:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Google announces agreement to acquire Wiz (151 points | 102 comments)
2. Wired is dropping paywalls for FOIA-based reporting. Others should follow (187 points | 15 comments)
3. The Failure Rate of EBS (27 points | 8 comments)
4. The Model Is the Product (135 points | 56 comments)
5. SheepIt Render Farm server code goes open source (61 points | 1 comment)
6. Show HN: I made a live multiplayer Minesweeper game (50 points | 27 comments)
7. Half-Life 2 RTX (93 points | 50 comments)
8. Java 24 (63 points | 27 comments)
9. Block YouTube ads on AppleTV by decrypting and stripping ads from Profobuf (484 points | 283 comments)
10. Extracting DNA from the air – DNA evidence of human occupancy in indoor premises (181 points | 49 comments)
11. Rust on the RP2350 (30 points | 12 comments)
12. Sesame CSM: A Conversational Speech Generation Model (59 points | 3 comments)
13. The Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance Is a Stone-Cold Masterpiece (126 points | 48 comments)
14. Hungary's use of facial recognition violates EU AI Act (17 points | discuss)
15. Changing Forecasts for Python Questions on Stack Overflow (3 points | discuss)
16. Building AI agents to query your databases (96 points | 32 comments)
17. UK wants dirt on data brokers before criminals get there first (34 points | 7 comments)
18. You Do Not Need Blockchain: Popular Use Cases and Why They Do Not Work (2019) (66 points | 53 comments)
19. Past and Present Futures of User Interface Design (176 points | 80 comments)
20. Depot (YC W23) is hiring a founding developer marketer (EU/US remote) ( | hide)
21. When Oregon blew up a whale with 20 cases of dynamite (2024) (69 points | 44 comments)
22. AI crawlers haven't learned to play nice with websites (46 points | 29 comments)
23. Rhombus Language (180 points | 103 comments)
24. Deep Learning Is Not So Mysterious or Different (434 points | 108 comments)
25. Archival Storage (328 points | 162 comments)
26. Rippling sues Deel over spying (334 points | 61 comments)
27. The PhD Metagame: Don't try to reform science – not yet (110 points | 98 comments)
28. Alphabet spins out Taara – Internet over lasers (253 points | 247 comments)
29. Breaking Up with On-Call (100 points | 110 comments)
30. The Unofficial Guide to OpenAI Realtime WebRTC API (4 points | discuss)
